principle.name: Clarity and Conciseness
principle.description: The ticket should be easily understood by anyone on the team, especially QA. Avoid jargon where possible.
principle.rationale: Clear tickets lead to better testing and understanding of the feature.

principle.name: Focus on What, Not How
principle.description: Describe the feature's functionality from a user's perspective, not the technical implementation details.
principle.rationale: This aligns with the Linear method of keeping implementation details out of the issue itself.

ticket_content.guideline: The title should be a direct statement of the feature.
The description should clearly explain what the feature does.
Include a list of the key files related to the feature for context.

category.name: before_completion
category.item: Does the ticket accurately describe the feature?
Is the language clear and simple?
Are all the relevant files listed?
